description: Preparation of a research manuscript using class data from practical classes. Includes experiments, data recording, and scientific communication (2000 words).
MCQs and short answer questions testing application of knowledge from lectures, collaborative learning sessions, practical classes and online resources.
Multiple-choice and short answer questions assessing drug knowledge application to clinical scenarios and identification of research areas for drug targets.
Group research project presented as scientific poster with Q&A session. Evaluated on scientific content, visual communication, and verbal presentation skills.
